title: thagunayya dhasharatha
sahitya:
tagunayya dasharatha rAmacandra daya dalacavEmi nIku 

pagavADanA entO pati mAlinagAni palkavEmi



caraNam 1



 nagumOmu jUparA nAyanna ninu cAla namminAnu 

inta agaDuga jUcitE Avala evari pAlayya nEnu



caraNam 2



 patitulanella pAvanula jEyudunni palukanEla 

ippuDati ghOrakalula manucu mammula viDanADanEla



caraNam 3



 annannagAni rAkunnAvu O rAma ninnumAna 

nEninnagAni parulanella bOnu nA kannulAna



caraNam 4



 padapaDi mimujEra baDina vAralanu jEpaTTa lEdA 

nannu vadalitE mIvaNTi vAriki yapakIrti vAdugadA



caraNam 5



 anudinamu bhadrAdri dAmuDavani ninnarasinAnu 

nEnu vinayamutO rAmadAsuDanani vinnavincinAnu
